name: Baby White Tiger Snow Dash
description:
Wanna dash through the snow? However this time it’s not just with sleigh, but with Baby White Tiger! Cooolness right?

So it’s winter and what are the coolest things to do on winter? Dash through the snow! Play with snow! Make snowman! And oh, download Baby White Tiger Snow Dash!

How To Play
> Dash through the snow
> Collect as many treats as you can
> Avoid hitting the obstacles
> Travel the farthest mile

Game Features
> Chillax game
> Very easy to navigate
> Adorable game character for all ages
